content: I'd like to add an option which stores all the downloaded packages and whatnot in target/.cargo or similar. I know that you can override CARGO_HOME but that seems to break the resolution of the config file, which is not ideal. I got as far as modifying src/cargo/util/config/mod.rs before realizing that the current target directory is not available... is there any way to access it consistently from the config or would this require a bunch of refactoring?
@Eric Huss just noticing you seem to be active on gh... any pointers?

@devsnek I'm not sure if this is a feature we would actually want. Usually if you want to propose a feature, it would be good to discuss it on the issue tracker or on internals. There is a pretty big queue of things, so I can't promise that we would be able to respond to it, but if you write a proposal I can try to bring it up during a team meeting.
